Description: Used to capture the service provider ID.
Error Response: Please enter 8 digit number for Service Provider Id.

Description: Used to capture the name of the company.
Error Response: Company Name should be less than 50 characters

Description: Used to capture the address of the company.
Error Response: Address should be less than 255 characters

Description: Used to capture the description about the SP.
Error Response: Description should be less than 255 characters

Description: Used to capture the whitelisted phone numbers.
Validation: Must not overlap with blacklisted numbers
Error Response: Should be comma-separated phone numbers having 15 digits as maximum and 8 digits as minimum
You can not have a White-listed user in the Blacklisted user list.
Msisdn are Duplicate in White listed Msisdn.

Description: Used to capture the blacklisted phone numbers.
Alias dedicated for the respective service provider across all SP Apps.
Validation: Alias must be unique across SPs
Valid regex or alphanumeric pattern (see Appendix B)
Error Response: Dedicated alias/es - [Alias Name] or a wildcard format is already in use
Invalid regular expression/s {Dedicated Alias} please enter valid regular expression.

Description: SP-typed User(s) to be assigned for the new SP.
Validation: At least one SP-typed user should be selected

Description: Marketing user(s) who is allowed to monitor the SP and applications.
Validation: At least one marketing user should be selected

Description: Select the resources to be allowed for the SP. Options: SMS, MMS, BAS, WAPPUSH, USSD, SWS.
Validation: At least one resource should be selected
